PROFESSIONALISM Our staff Experts. We have deep and valuable professional knowledge that we share with customers. We understand that achieving a serious level of efficiency is possible only with the high professionalism of each employee and his responsible attitude towards each client.
TEAM We are one team, we have common values, we act to achieve ambitious goals for the Company! We are confident that to work effectively you need the coordinated work of the whole team and the personal responsibility of each for a high overall result.
PARTNERSHIP We value every client and partner of Makosh Company and build our work on the basis of effective and mutually beneficial cooperation, trust and respect. We offer our clients products and ready-made solutions aimed at the best satisfaction of their needs.
DEVELOPMENT Application of innovations, creative approach and encouragement of creative initiative move our Company forward! We understand that only the most complete self-realization of each member of our team will lead the company to success!
RESULT We enjoy the process and work for the overall result. We only encourage achievements, not the illusion of activity! Working in Makoš is a favorite thing for all of us!
A RESPONSIBILITY The ability to take responsibility is comparable to confidence in success. We always fulfill our obligations to managers, colleagues, clients and partners. We are responsible for the quality of our products and those who make our company successful!
THE TRUST For our company, trust is the foundation. We believe that the atmosphere of mutual trust helps us to work with full dedication and increases the efficiency of our business.
